name: The most popular board game of all time reimagined.
blurb: Action-packed, 2-level, 3D game with traps, springs & exploding game squares for Mac, PC, or mobile.

rewards.reward: <MOBILE VERSION>: Every dollar counts and every two dollars count double (it's true, some scientists at MIT did the math). When $1 doesn't say enough and $3 says "Hey dude, I'm not a Romney", your $2 pledge is the perfect demonstration of your generosity. \r\n\r\nWe will gift you a ChessTrap download at the Apple or Google Play app stores.

<MAC VERSION>: Want to play ChessTrap on your Mac? We'll email you the Digital Download Mac Version and you can cross that one off your bucket list and move on to breaking Baumgartner's record with a Party City helium tank and that lawn chair rusting in your back yard.

<PC VERSION>: So you're the PC type? No worries we don't discriminate. We'll email you the Digital Download PC version of ChessTrap and then you and the Gaters (what Bill's friends call him) can square off in a challenging game of checkmate fun.

<LTD EDITION>: We stole this one from about a million other Kickstarter campaigns. Pledge $11 and own the LIMITED EDITION KICKSTARTER CHESS SET for Mac or PC. Get it here or, well, nowhere. Once our campaign has closed so will your opportunity to own this set. If that isn't beautiful marketing speak to "act now", we don't know what is [which might be obvious to you by now]. What's it look like? We don't know. We are going to let the folks at Kickstarter design it.

<T-Shirt Gift Pack>: ChessTrap T-SHIRTS ARE COOL (a Pew Internet & Life report we dreamed about last night said so), and SO ARE YOU for supporting us. Get the Mac or PC version of the game AND...wait for it.... a freakishly awesome ChessTrap tee. *NOTE: Our lawyers [eg. our friend who failed the bar but is pretty sure he's going to pass next time] said to tell you "we" think you're cool, but we make no official guarantees that your ex isn't still posting vicious lies about you on Facebook.

<POSTER PACK> Look to your right. That wall needs something don't you think? Something screen printed on archival paper in a numbered limited-edition. We got just the something-screen-printed-on-archival-paper thing you need for that wall and we are only printing 500 and numbering them by hand as we go\u2014imagine that?! (Size 24"x36") Plus you will get the mobile, Mac and PC downloads.
<GAME CREDIT>: We will add a list of people we think are cool inside the app. We think people are cool who pledge $30. Want your name on the list? Mobile version and Mac or PC version included too.
<LIFETIME MEMBER>: Get copies of every current AND FUTURE ChessTrap digital editions (Christmas, Halloween, licensed characters, etc. etc.) that will ever be developed!

<YOUR CHESSTRAP GAME DESIGN>: Our hats off to you Mr./Mrs./Ms./YRM/ ChessTrap God you. You concept, design or otherwise command into reality YOUR VERY OWN VERSION OF CHESSTRAP. We will have it built, programmed, and throw it out to the world to use. You will get "designed by" credit. Note, you have to actually own any copyrighted material so unless you're George Lucas don't ask for a Wookies vs. Gungans play set. And if you are George Lucas shoot Kendal an email with the subject "Just trolling on Kickstarter and I want to buy your company."
